title: The After Show Discusses Who Will Buy Nat Sherman Cigars
itunes:title: The After Show Discusses Who Will Buy Nat Sherman Cigars
description:
This week, The After Show talks about who might buy Nat Sherman cigars from Altria. Who does each person think will emerge as the buyer?   The After show is brought to you by Roma Craft Tobac.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
